After a career in corporate financial and technology management, I am pursuing a degree in Software Engineering with a focus in Data Science.

I aim to combine my business and technical skills to deliver A.I. solutions to small and medium-sized businesses.

I believe that Deep Learning can be applied to nearly all aspects of business and will become a critical success factor in the immediate future. My goal is to help businesses exploit these technologies to improve their customers’ experience as well as their employee satisfaction and performance.

Harvard Extension / Software Engineering

Certificate in data science with coursework target towards computer vision problems.
